Package io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql

Class MySQLConfig<T>

java.lang.Object
io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.Config<T>
io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql.MySQLConfig<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the data being stored
public class MySQLConfig<T> extends Config<T>
A MySQL Config for storing data on a MySQL server
Since:
1.0.0
